description.value:
You learn the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-level-1.TT94JMKOUYP2WM96]{Cojoin Familiar} spell. Familiars you create with this spell gain the following benefits:

  • The familiar’s attacks deal fire damage instead of the listed damage types.
  • The familiar is immune to fire damage.
  • The familiar’s creature type is Elemental.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
